fr:mainmatter.fr:p: We now prove (ii) and (iii) of , which will finish the proof.

fr:p.fr:em: Independence from the choice of K^ \bullet.

html:li.fr:p: The filtrations F and W of \operatorname {H} ^ \bullet (X, \mathbb {C} ) are the abutments of the hypercohomology spectral sequences of \Omega _{ \bar {X}}^ \bullet \langle Y \rangle for the filtrations F and W. These whole spectral sequences do not depend on the choice of K^ \bullet.

fr:p.fr:em: Independence from the choice of compactification.
